title: Snow Day Syndra
body:
There are problems with the **Snow Day Syndra** skin. Where she does not show the correct animations. In **death, sphere spawn, and throw or push.** I am sorry, but I was too lazy to check if this happened in the **Classic Syndra {{champion:134}} ** skin. I love playing with the **Snow Day Syndra** skin, but I get weirded out when I see the weird things that the skin now does. Hope this gets fixed soon.

EDIT: Now, the comboing isn't as bad, but the death on Syndra is still very strange. I checked with Atlantean on a different computer as well, and her body seems figgity. Creep Blocked Syndra is back tho.

replies.body: I have problems Q --> E Comboing with that skin for some reason. Every other skin is fine but snow day seems... Off

Hey CerberusFury - 

Thanks for the report - we're looking into it!
